input.label: block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700
input.field: mt-1 block text-sm font-normal rounded-md shadow-sm border border-gray-300 outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-transparent p-2.5 appearance-none

button: flex w-full text-left justify-center items-center bg-black text-white text-sm font-bold rounded-md p-3 px-6
